content.title: Artificial Intelligence - Computer Engineering Capstone Project
description: Led a 5-member team and owned the AI component, developing and deploying a neural network on FPGA for real-time gesture recognition.
Enhanced model accuracy through hyperparameter tuning, feature engineering, and 10× data augmentation, reducing false predictions.
Directed external communications and implemented secure TCP/IP and MQTT protocols with AES encryption, concurrency handling, and error checking.
Built and tested 1- and 2-player systems with round counters and packet validation for seamless subsystem integration.

content.title: Blockchain – ETHGlobal Bangkok
description: Secured runner-up in the Real-World Impact: Best Social Good Application track on Polygon, competing against 2,750+ developers, with DocuEarn, a privacy-focused dApp enabling passive income from health data using zero-knowledge proofs.

Implemented Web3Auth for user-friendly access to blockchain features, a seamless frontend using TypeScript, React, and Vite, and integrated Privado ID for cryptographic credentials, along with Sign Protocol for ensuring data authenticity.

content.title: Blockhain - ETHGlobal Singapore
description: Won 3rd place among 309 projects in Worldcoin's Best Use of World ID track at ETHGlobal Singapore by developing ZkScholar, a decentralized app for private financial aid applications using zk-SNARKs, collaborating in a team of three.

Built the frontend with Next.js and TypeScript, integrated World ID for secure authentication, deployed smart contracts on Ethereum Sepolia using Hardhat and Infura, utilised ethers.js and Protokit for blockchain interaction and data management.

content.title: Quantitative Finance – QuantEdge Summer Insights Program
description: Learned financial management, investment strategies, and asset allocation from senior management and analysts.
Extended externship to complete a technical project in portfolio management.

content.title: Hardware - FPGA Design Project
description: Collaborated as a team of four on an FPGA project using the Basys3 board.
Developed animated menus and transitions for a Whac-A-Mole game in Verilog using Vivado.
Applied mathematical equations and physics principles for smooth transitions and RGB calculations.

content.title: Robotics - RTOS-Based Robotic Car
description: Achieved top 5 fastest times among 27 teams in the final race.
Developed an RTOS-based robotic car using ESP32 and KL25Z boards.
Implemented PS4 controller connectivity, Bluetooth communication, and precise motor PWM control for multidirectional movement and curved turns.

content.title: Blockchain - PennApps XXIV
description: Won the Best Education Hack award at PennApps XXIV, ranking among the top 8 teams out of 354 participants.
Developed a zk-SNARKs-based solution to streamline student aid applications.
Implemented 2FA using USB and SHA256 encryption, built with Next.js, Prisma ORM, and PlanetScale.

content.title: Artificial Intelligence - HawkHack 2023
description: Won 1st Place Best Solo Hack at HawkHack 2023 organized by Montclair State University.
Developed customizable travel itineraries using OpenAI models and integrated MapBox for interactive map features.

content.title: Telegram Bot - Study Buddy
description: Led the development and deployment of a Telegram Bot for student study groups using Python and MongoDB on Heroku.
Reached 80 engineering students with 29 active users in a pilot program.

content.title: Augmented Reality - NUS IDEATE 2022
description: Proposed a 3-pronged approach to empower elderly mental health using assistive technology, real-time monitoring, and virtual connections.
Prototyped an AR-based smart glasses application using Nreal Light for alerts and guidance.

content.title: Game Development - Orbital - Apollo 11 (Advanced)
description: Developed a single-player precision platformer game in Unity using C#.
Created original sprites and art, investing over 400 hours in design and gameplay development.

content.title: Augmented Reality - Summer Bootcamp on Future Interfaces with Smart Glasses
description: Developed an Android app for Nreal Light AR glasses using Unity and Microsoft Mixed Reality Toolkit.
Enabled navigation assistance in shopping malls through location triggers and user tracking.

content.title: Robotics - Alex to the Rescue!
description: Built a tele-operated search and rescue robot using Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and LIDAR.
Implemented Hector SLAM, bare-metal programming, and TLS-secured communication.

content.title: Blockchain - Singapore Blockchain Innovation Challenge 2021
description: Won 3rd Place in the Enthusiast Track.
Developed a web app for instant insurance payouts by linking health and insurance blockchains using the Affinidi platform.
Extended project scope using ZKSync Layer-2 to minimize gas fees.

content.title: Robotics - A-maze-ing Race Project
description: Built a maze-navigating mBot equipped with color detection and audio capabilities.
Integrated IR proximity, color, and ultrasonic sensors with Arduino-based control systems.
